titles.title: Calling upon the Government of Zimbabwe to postpone the run-off presidential election scheduled for Friday, June 27, 2008.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
6/24/2008--Introduced.
Calls upon the government of Zimbabwe to postpone the June 27, 2008, run-off presidential election. States that in the absence of a free vote in a run-off election, the legitimacy of the Mugabe regime has been so seriously undermined that Robert Mugabe must step down.
